dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: My cousin in Astana just texted me, said she had to dig out her winter coat again because it's dropping to near freezing tonight.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: My cousin in Astana just texted me, said she had to dig out her winter coat again because it's dropping to near freezing tonight.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, yeah, that's uh, right in line with the forecast for April 30th there—night temps around 0 to 2 degrees Celsius, with a risk of frost. That's pretty chilly for almost May!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow, yeah, that's uh, right in line with the forecast for April thirtieth there-night temps around zero to two degrees Celsius, with a risk of frost. That's pretty chilly for almost May!

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the wind on the 29th sounds intense too, gusts up to 28 meters per second? That's like, hold onto your hat weather, literally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the wind on the twenty ninth sounds intense too, gusts up to twenty eight meters per second? That's like, hold onto your hat weather, literally.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously, they're cautioning people to be careful outdoors, especially in open areas. Meanwhile, Almaty is getting thunderstorms and way warmer temps, like 30 degrees.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, Almaty's looking at 30 to 32 degrees Celsius during the day on the 29th, but then thunderstorms in the evening. So it's like, summer one minute, storm the next.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they're advising people to keep an umbrella handy, which, you know, makes sense with those sudden downpours.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're advising people to keep an umbrella handy, which, you know, makes sense with those sudden downpours.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thunderstorms are possible in the evening " keep an umbrella handy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's such a contrast between the two cities though—Astana dealing with near frost and Almaty hitting low 30s. Kazakhstan's weather is all over the place.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's such a contrast between the two cities though-Astana dealing with near frost and Almaty hitting low 30s. Kazakhstan's weather is all over the place.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and by May 1st, Astana improves a bit, up to 15-17 degrees, but Almaty is still seeing rain and thunderstorms, temperatures around 21-23.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and by May first, Astana improves a bit, up to fifteen to seventeen degrees, but Almaty is still seeing rain and thunderstorms, temperatures around twenty one to twenty three.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So if you're traveling between them this weekend, pack for everything—coat, umbrella, maybe even sunscreen?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So if you're traveling between them this weekend, pack for everything-coat, umbrella, maybe even sunscreen?
